#include<iostream>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int primes[1001]={0};


int main(){
int t,i,j,sum;
primes[0]=primes[1]=1;
for(i=2;i<=sqrt(1001);i++){
    if(primes[i]==0){
        for(j=2*i;j<=1001;j=j+i){
            primes[j]=1;
        }
    }
}
cin>>t;
while(t--){
sum=0;
int n,k=29;
cin>>n;
for(i=k;i<=n;i++){
if(primes[i]==0) sum+=i;
}
cout<<sum<<"\n";
}
return 0;
}
